text: Miguel Santín del Castillo (1830–1880) was President of El Salvador from 7 February 1858 to 7 June 1858, and again from 18 September 1858 to 19 January 1859.Gerardo Barrios An army officer himself, he founded the Military Academy of San Salvador. At age 28, he was the youngest ever president of El Salvador. ==References== Category:Presidents of El Salvador Category:19th-century politicians Category:1830 births Category:1880 deaths
title: Miguel Santín del Castillo
